titles.title: Honoring the life and accomplishments of Kevin Dwayne Ener, a dedicated radio broadcaster who worked diligently to provide valuable broadcast services to the Acres Homes Communities in Houston, Texas.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: 2/8/2007--Introduced. Commends Kevin Dwayne Ener for his dedication and service as a radio broadcaster in the Acres Homes Community of Houston, Texas.
